PRODUCT_SECTION.TITLE: AutoCut
PRODUCT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: It is an innovative platform designed to transform the way automotive content creators produce, edit, publish, and analyze their content, bringing together AI-powered tools in one unified space.

FEATURES_SECTION.TITLE: Features
FEATURES_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: AutoCut offers a unified platform that integrates key tools such as AI-based car recognition, automatic clip evaluation, and social media content optimization. This allows content creators to improve productivity, reduce costs, and increase the reach of their posts ‚Äî all in one place.

HERO.TITLE: CODIFY
HERO.SUBTITLE: Innovations
HERO.DESCRIPTION: At Codify Innovations, we develop high-impact technological solutions. We build web and mobile platforms focused on performance, security, and scalability. We transform ideas into intelligent digital products that drive business innovation.
